Download¶

The recommended method to get psubprocess is to download one of the releases, but if you want to access the latest code you can do it at git.

psubprocess 0.1¶

psubprocess 0.1.0. Relased on 30-04-2010.

Changes:

  • Initial Release.

Feedback, positive or negative will be appreciated.
